event_text: m_c was running around excitedly on patrol when their paw landed right in a rabbit hole, twisting uncomfortably.  They limped the whole way home.
m_c couldn't help but try to show off by climbing the tallest tree they could find. Their plan backfired when they fell out of the tree.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after falling from a tall tree.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after falling from a tall tree.

event_text: m_c was practicing their tree climbing skills when they slipped from a branch! Thankfully they survived, though badly injured.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after falling from a tree.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after falling from a tree.

event_text: m_c was hunting on a night patrol, and nearly carried off by an owl! They're alive, but with many a scratch as proof of their adventure.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after an owl tried to carry them off.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after an owl tried to carry them off.

event_text: r_c dares m_c to climb one of the tallest trees in the territory. m_c gets pretty high, but a branch breaks and it's a long way to the ground. r_c goes sprinting for camp to get help.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after falling from a tall tree and breaking their back.
